episodes.original_body:
Case: Joseph-Ott-MVA-8-06-2025
Client: Joseph Ott

From: justin@whaleylawfirm.com
To: 'Gail Sweasy' lgsweasy@gmail.com
Date: Wed Aug 27 2025 10:42:27 GMT-04:00
Just confirmed both Maia and Jensen have open and active PIP claims.
From: Gail Sweasy
Sent: Wednesday, August 27, 2025 10:38 AM
To: justin@whaleylawfirm.com
Subject: Joseph ott
Adjuster is Brittany young
908 842 1643
episodes.natural_language:
Case Joseph-Ott-MVA-8-06-2025 involves client Joseph Ott following a motor vehicle accident.

On August 27, 2025, two email exchanges occurred between Justin Whaley of Whaley Law Firm (justin@whaleylawfirm.com) and Gail Sweasy (lgsweasy@gmail.com). At 10:38 AM, Gail sent a message to Justin with the subject “Joseph ott,” noting that the adjuster for the matter is Brittany Young and providing the contact number 908-842-1643. Four minutes later, at 10:42:27 AM GMT-04:00, Justin replied to confirm that Maia and Jensen have open and active PIP claims.
episodes.author: AaronW

about.relevance: sent reply email confirming PIP claims

In the case Joseph-Ott-MVA-8-06-2025, the client is Joseph Ott involved in a motor vehicle accident.

A new insurance note dated August 25, 2025 indicates that a new adjuster has been assigned and that coverage is still under investigation.

The claim concerns Bodily Injury (BI) with Progressive Insurance Company, and the note was written by Justin Chumbley.

episodes.original_body:
Case: Joseph-Ott-MVA-8-06-2025

CLIENT CONTACT
Details: Spoke with client, no response on PD claim yet. Is going to attempt to see a specialist, is making an appointment with his PCP. Will send us that info
Person Making Contact: Justin
Date & Time: August 26 2025
episodes.natural_language:
Initial client contact on August 26, 2025 with Joseph Ott regarding the motor vehicle accident case Joseph-Ott-MVA-8-06-2025. The contact was made by Justin.

Justin spoke with the client, and there has been no response yet on the PD claim. The client intends to pursue a specialist evaluation and is making an appointment with his primary care physician. He will send us that information when it becomes available.
episodes.author: AaronW

episodes.natural_language:
Case: Joseph-Ott-MVA-8-06-2025. Initial client contact on August 11, 2025 with Joseph Ott regarding a motor vehicle accident.

Client information: The client is Joseph Ott. Date of accident: August 6, 2025. Date of birth: April 11, 1988. Phone: 502-616-6505. Address: 3820 Leland Rd, Apt 1, Louisville, KY 40207.

Incident details: The incident occurred at the intersection of Okalona blue rick rod and South Park Road. The case is associated with Louisville Metro Police Department (LMPD) and Report # 25091782. Direct Insurance is involved with a claim filed.

Medical and disposition: The client went to the ER at UofL Health West Hebron Lane in Shepherdsville.

Injuries: Concussion, neck and back pain, glass in his arm, and left shoulder.

Contacts: The person making contact was Justin. Date & Time of contact: August 11, 2025.
episodes.author: AaronW
